actions.name: CreateLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to create a landing zone

actions.name: CreateManagedAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to create an account managed by AWS Control Tower

actions.name: DeleteLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to delete AWS Control Tower landing zone

actions.name: DeregisterManagedAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an account created through the account factory from AWS Control Tower

actions.name: DeregisterOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an organizational unit from AWS Control Tower management

actions.name: DescribeAccountFactoryConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the current account factory configuration

actions.name: DescribeCoreService
actions.description: Grants permission to describe resources managed by core accounts in AWS Control Tower

actions.name: DescribeGuardrail
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a guardrail

actions.name: DescribeGuardrailForTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a guardrail for a organizational unit

actions.name: DescribeLandingZoneConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the current Landing Zone configuration

actions.name: DescribeManagedAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an account created through account factory

actions.name: DescribeManagedOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an AWS Organizations organizational unit managed by AWS Control Tower

actions.name: DescribeRegisterOrganizationalUnitOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a Register Organizational Unit Operation

actions.name: DescribeSingleSignOn
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the current AWS Control Tower IAM Identity Center configuration

actions.name: DisableBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to disable a Baseline on a target

actions.name: DisableControl
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a control from an organizational unit

actions.name: DisableGuardrail
actions.description: Grants permission to disable a guardrail from an organizational unit

actions.name: EnableBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to enable a Baseline on a target

actions.name: EnableControl
actions.description: Grants permission to activate a control for an organizational unit

actions.name: EnableGuardrail
actions.description: Grants permission to enable a guardrail to an organizational unit

actions.name: GetAccountInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an account email and validate that it exists

actions.name: GetAvailableUpdates
actions.description: Grants permission to list available updates for the current AWS Control Tower deployment

actions.name: GetBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to get Baseline details

actions.name: GetBaselineOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of a particular Baseline operation

actions.name: GetControlOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of a particular EnabledControl or DisableControl operation

actions.name: GetEnabledBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to get an enabled Baseline

actions.name: GetEnabledControl
actions.description: Grants permission to get an enabled control from an organizational unit

actions.name: GetGuardrailComplianceStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current compliance status of a guardrail

actions.name: GetHomeRegion
actions.description: Grants permission to get the home region of the AWS Control Tower setup

actions.name: GetLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of the landing zone setup

actions.name: GetLandingZoneDriftStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current landing zone drift status

actions.name: GetLandingZoneOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of a particular landing zone operation

actions.name: GetLandingZoneStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get the current status of the landing zone setup

actions.name: ListBaselines
actions.description: Grants permission to list Baselines

actions.name: ListControlOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all control operations

actions.name: ListDirectoryGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list the current directory groups available through IAM Identity Center

actions.name: ListDriftDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to list occurrences of drift in AWS Control Tower

actions.name: ListEnabledBaselines
actions.description: Grants permission to list enabled Baselines

actions.name: ListEnabledControls
actions.description: Grants permission to list all enabled controls in a specified organizational unit

actions.name: ListEnabledGuardrails
actions.description: Grants permission to list currently enabled guardrails

actions.name: ListExtendGovernancePrecheckDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to list Precheck details for an Organizational Unit

actions.name: ListExternalConfigRuleCompliance
actions.description: Grants permission to list the compliance of external AWS Config rules

actions.name: ListGuardrailViolations
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing guardrail violations

actions.name: ListGuardrails
actions.description: Grants permission to list all available guardrails

actions.name: ListGuardrailsForTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to list guardrails and their current state for a organizational unit

actions.name: ListLandingZoneOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all landing zone operations

actions.name: ListLandingZones
actions.description: Grants permission to list all landing zones

actions.name: ListManagedAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to list accounts managed through AWS Control Tower

actions.name: ListManagedAccountsForGuardrail
actions.description: Grants permission to list managed accounts with a specified guardrail applied

actions.name: ListManagedAccountsForParent
actions.description: Grants permission to list managed accounts under an organizational unit

actions.name: ListManagedOrganizationalUnits
actions.description: Grants permission to list organizational units managed by AWS Control Tower

actions.name: ListManagedOrganizationalUnitsForGuardrail
actions.description: Grants permission to list managed organizational units that have a specified guardrail applied

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

actions.name: ManageOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to set up an organizational unit to be managed by AWS Control Tower

actions.name: PerformPreLaunchChecks
actions.description: Grants permission to perform validations in an account

actions.name: ResetEnabledBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to reset an enabled Baseline

actions.name: ResetLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to reset a landing zone

actions.name: SetupLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to set up or update AWS Control Tower landing zone

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateAccountFactoryConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the account factory configuration

actions.name: UpdateEnabledBaseline
actions.description: Grants permission to update an enabled Baseline

actions.name: UpdateEnabledControl
actions.description: Grants permission to update an enabled control for an organizational unit

actions.name: UpdateLandingZone
actions.description: Grants permission to update a landing zone
